name: Mary Bake Lasagna-Western Recipe
description:
Mary Bake Lasagna is a fun-filled food making game.
Hello girls!Mary is a little girl just like you and she loves to cook! Today she is making world's best lasagna for her friends because they are having a party date and the world's best lasagna will be great for their tea party.Make full use of you smart cooking skills to help Mary cook the the world's best lasagna ever! Have fun!

Features:
- Making processes of the Mary Bake Lasagna in details
- Sets of cookwares, enjoy Mary Bake Lasagna
- Simple operations, easy to play, addictive Mary Bake Lasagna
- Mary Bake Lasagna, improve your cooking fun
- Fluent flash, fresh drawing, have fun in Mary Bake Lasagna
